name: Orbitria's Tales
description:
Orbitria's Tales

A mixed game between a turn-based RPG and a rogue-lite.

Both your team and your enemies share the same energy to realize attacks and support abilities, so each turn is a fight against each other and also for the resources.

Go through the dungeon and fight monsters to upgrade your skills. After every encounter, you have the chance to absorb the energy of the fallen to heal your party or learn an ability randomly. Also, there are some chests scattered through the dungeon that allows you to learn specific abilities with one of your party members. 

Will you defeat the boss? 

Controls

You can use controllers and/or the keyboard to play. If playing with the keyboard, awsd to move through the dungeon. The space is the key to submit/accept an option. Use the left-alt key to cancel the action or return to the previous menu. 

Zoom in/out the minimap using i/o keys respectively.
